sql-map.name: MDSProductMap
sql-map.mapped-statement: UPDATE MDS_PRODUCT_GENERAL_DETAILS SET PROD_DESC = #prodDesc#, ACCT_HEAD = #acctHead#, ONLY_MEMBER = #onlyMember#, ACCEPT_TYPE_CLASSA = #acceptClassA#, ACCEPT_TYPE_CLASSB = #acceptClassB#, ACCEPT_TYPE_CLASSC = #acceptClassC#, ACCEPT_TYPE_CLASSALL = #acceptClassAll#, SURETY = #surety#, ACCEPTABLE_TYPE_CLASSA = #acceptableClassA#, ACCEPTABLE_TYPE_CLASSB = #acceptableClassB#, ACCEPTABLE_TYPE_CLASSC = #acceptableClassC#, ACCEPTABLE_TYPE_CLASSALL = #acceptableClassAll#, SHORT_FALL = #shortFall#, DEFAULT_CHIT_OWNERS = #defaultChitOwners#, NON_PRIZED_CHANGE = #nonPrizedChange#, BONUS_EXISTING_CHITTAL = #bonusExistingChit#, BONUS_ROUNDOFF = #roundoffCriteria#, BONUS_ROUNDING = #bonusRounding#, BONUS_FIRST_INSTALLMENT = #bonusPayForFirstIns#, ADVANCE_COLLECTION = #advanceCollection#, AUCTION_MAXAMT = #auctionMaxamt#, AUCTION_MINAMT = #auctionMinamt#, BONUS_ALLOWED = #bonusAllowed#, PRIZED_OWNER_BONUS = #prizedOwnerBonus#, AFTER_AUCTION_ELIGIBLE = #afterAuctionEligible#, AFTER_PAYMENT_ELIGIBLE = #afterPaymentEligible#, PRIZED_DEFAULTERS = #prizedDefaulters#, HOLIDAY_INT = #holidayInt#, STATUS = #status#, STATUS_BY = #statusBy#, AUTHORIZE_STATUS = NULL, STATUS_DT = #statusDt#, TRANS_FIRST_INSTALLMENT = #transForFirstIns#, SECURITY_PENDING = #rdoPending#, SECURITY_PRIZED = #rdoPrized#, CLOSURE_METHOD1=#rdoMethod1#, CLOSURE_METHOD2=#rdoMethod2#, WHICHEVER_IS_LESS_PRZ_INS=#rdoPrizdOrInstlAmtIsLess#, FROM_AUCTION_ENTRY = #fromAuctionEnrtry#, AFTER_CASH_PAYMENT = #afterCashPayment#, IS_SPLIT_MDS_TRANSACTION = #splitMDSTransaction#, IS_GDS=#isGDS#, IS_BONUS_TRANSFER = #isBonusTrans# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId#

UPDATE MDS_ACCT_HEAD SET PROD_ID = #prodId#, RECEIPT_HEAD = #receiptHead#, PAYMENT_HEAD = #paymentHead#, SUSPENSE_HEAD = #suspenseHead#, MISCELLANEOUS_HEAD = #miscellaneousHead#, COMMISION_HEAD = #commisionHead#, BONUS_PAYABLE_HEAD = #bonusPayableHead#, BONUS_RECEIVABLE_HEAD = #bonusReceivableHead#, PENAL_INTEREST_HEAD = #penalInterestHead#, THALAYAL_REP_PAY_HEAD = #thalayalRepPayHead#, THALAYAL_BONUS_HEAD = #thalayalBonusHead#, MUNNAL_BONUS_HEAD = #munnalBonusHead#, MUNNAL_REP_PAY_HEAD = #munnalRepPayHead#, BANKING_REP_PAY_HEAD = #bankingRepPayHead#, NOTICE_CHARGES_HEAD = #noticeChargesHead#, CHARGE_PAYMENT_HEAD = #chargeHead#, CASE_EXPENSE_HEAD = #caseExpenseHead#, DISCOUNT_HEAD = #discountHead#, MDS_PAYABLE_HEAD = #mdsPayableHead#, MDS_RECEIVABLE_HEAD = #mdsReceivableHead#, SUNDRY_RECEIPT_HEAD = #sundryHead#, SUSPENSE_GL_ACCNO = #suspenseGLorAccount#, SUSPENSE_PROD_ID = #suspenseProdId#, SUSPENSE_ACC_NO = #suspenseAccNo#, SUNDRY_PAYMENT_HEAD = #sundryPaymentHead#, POSTAGE_HEAD =#postageHead#, ARC_COST =#arcCostHead#, ARC_EXPENSE =#arcExpenseHead#, EA_COST =#eaCostHead#, EA_EXPENSE =#eaExpenseHead#, EP_COST =#epCostHead#, EP_EXPENSE =#epExpenseHead#, STAMP_ADVANCES_HEAD=#stampRecoveryHead#, POSTAGE_ADV_HEAD=#postageAdvHead#, MDS_FORFEITED_ACCT_HEAD = #forFeitedHead#, LEGAL_CHARGES = #legalChrgActHead#, PART_PAY_BONUS_RECOVERY = #partPayBonusRecoveryHead:VARCHAR#, OTHER_CHARGES = #otherChargeHead:VARCHAR# WHERE SCHEME_NAME = #schemeName:VARCHAR#

INSERT INTO MDS_PRODUCT_OTHER_DETAILS( PROD_ID, COMMISION_RATE_AMT, COMMISION_RATE_TYPE, DISCOUNT_RATE_AMT, DISCOUNT_RATE_TYPE, PENAL_INT_AMT, PENAL_INT_TYPE, PENAL_PRIZED_INT_AMT, PENAL_PRIZED_INT_TYPE, LOAN_INT_AMT, LOAN_INT_TYPE, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_MONTHS, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_AFTER, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_END, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_MNTH, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_AFT, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_END, PENAL_GRACE_PERIOD, PENAL_GRACE_PERIOD_TYPE, PENAL_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD, PENAL_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_TYPE, PENAL_CALC, DISCOUNT_ALLOWED, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_MONTHS, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_AFTER, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_END, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_MONTHS, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_AFTER, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_END, LOAN_ALLOWED, LOAN_MARGIN, MIN_LOAN_AMT, MAX_LOAN_AMT ,PENEL_INT_FULL_AMT_INST_AMT,PENEL_PZ_INT_FULL_AMT_INST_AMT,PRIZED_MONEY_PAYMENT_TYPE,PRIZED_MONEY_PAYMENT_AMT,BANK_MDS_TRNF_CAT_THALAYAL,BANK_MDS_TRNF_CAT_MUNNAL)VALUES( #prodId#, #commisionRateAmt#, #commisionRateType#, #discountRateAmt#, #discountRateType#, #penalIntAmt#, #penalIntType#, #penalPrizedIntAmt#, #penalPrizedIntType#, #loanIntAmt#, #loanIntType#, #bonusGracePeriodDays#, #bonusGracePeriodMonths#, #bonusGracePeriodAfter#, #bonusGracePeriodEnd#, #bonusGracePeriod#, #bonusPrizedGracePeriod#, #bonusPrizedGracePeriodDays#, #bonusPrizedGracePeriodMnth#, #bonusPrizedGracePeriodAft#, #bonusPrizedGracePeriodEnd#, #penalGracePeriod#, #penalGracePeriodType#, #penalPrizedGracePeriod#, #penalPrizedGracePeriodType#, #penalCalc#, #discountAllowed#, #disGracePeriodDays#, #disGracePeriodMonths#, #disGracePeriodAfter#, #disGracePeriodEnd#, #disGracePeriod#, #disPrizedGracePeriod#, #disPrizedGracePeriodDays#, #disPrizedGracePeriodMonths#, #disPrizedGracePeriodAfter#, #disPrizedGracePeriodEnd#, #loanAllowed#, #loanMargin#, #minLoanAmt#, #maxLoanAmt#,#penalIntRateFullInstAmt#,#penalPrizedIntRateFullInstAmt#,#priizedMoneyPaymentType#,#priizedMoneyPaymentAmt#,#thalayalBankTransferCategory#,#munnalBankTransferCategory#)

UPDATE MDS_PRODUCT_OTHER_DETAILS SET COMMISION_RATE_AMT = #commisionRateAmt#, COMMISION_RATE_TYPE = #commisionRateType#, DISCOUNT_RATE_AMT = #discountRateAmt#, DISCOUNT_RATE_TYPE = #discountRateType#, PENAL_INT_AMT = #penalIntAmt#, PENAL_INT_TYPE = #penalIntType#, PENAL_PRIZED_INT_AMT = #penalPrizedIntAmt#, PENAL_PRIZED_INT_TYPE = #penalPrizedIntType#, LOAN_INT_AMT = #loanIntAmt#, LOAN_INT_TYPE = #loanIntType#, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS = #bonusGracePeriodDays#, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_MONTHS = #bonusGracePeriodMonths#, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_AFTER = #bonusGracePeriodAfter#, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD_END = #bonusGracePeriodEnd#, BONUS_GRACE_PERIOD = #bonusGracePeriod#, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS = #bonusPrizedGracePeriodDays#, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_MNTH = #bonusPrizedGracePeriodMnth#, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_AFT = #bonusPrizedGracePeriodAft#, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_END = #bonusPrizedGracePeriodEnd#, BONUS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD = #bonusPrizedGracePeriod#, PENAL_GRACE_PERIOD = #penalGracePeriod#, PENAL_GRACE_PERIOD_TYPE = #penalGracePeriodType#, PENAL_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD = #penalPrizedGracePeriod#, PENAL_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_TYPE = #penalPrizedGracePeriodType#, PENAL_CALC = #penalCalc#, DISCOUNT_ALLOWED = #discountAllowed#, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS = #disGracePeriodDays#, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_MONTHS = #disGracePeriodMonths#, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_AFTER = #disGracePeriodAfter#, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD_END = #disGracePeriodEnd#, DIS_GRACE_PERIOD = #disGracePeriod#, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD = #disPrizedGracePeriod#, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_DAYS = #disPrizedGracePeriodDays#, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_MONTHS = #disPrizedGracePeriodMonths#, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_AFTER = #disPrizedGracePeriodAfter#, DIS_PRIZED_GRACE_PERIOD_END = #disPrizedGracePeriodEnd#, LOAN_ALLOWED = #loanAllowed#, LOAN_MARGIN = #loanMargin#, MIN_LOAN_AMT = #minLoanAmt#, MAX_LOAN_AMT = #maxLoanAmt#, PENEL_INT_FULL_AMT_INST_AMT=#penalIntRateFullInstAmt#, PENEL_PZ_INT_FULL_AMT_INST_AMT=#penalPrizedIntRateFullInstAmt#, PRIZED_MONEY_PAYMENT_TYPE=#priizedMoneyPaymentType#, PRIZED_MONEY_PAYMENT_AMT=#priizedMoneyPaymentAmt#, BANK_MDS_TRNF_CAT_THALAYAL = #thalayalBankTransferCategory#, BANK_MDS_TRNF_CAT_MUNNAL = #munnalBankTransferCategory# WHERE PROD_ID = #prodId#
sql-map.dynamic-mapped-statement:
SELECT PROD_ID,PROD_DESC,STATUS FROM MDS_PRODUCT_GENERAL_DETAILS WHERE STATUS!='DELETED'
ROWNUM <= 100
UPPER(PROD_ID) LIKE UPPER('%$PROD_ID$%')
UPPER(PROD_DESC) LIKE UPPER('%$PROD_DESC$%')
UPPER(STATUS) LIKE UPPER('%$STATUS$%')
sql-map.mapped-statement: SELECT PROD_ID,PROD_DESC,STATUS FROM MDS_PRODUCT_GENERAL_DETAILS MPGD WHERE (MPGD.STATUS != 'DELETED' OR MPGD.STATUS IS NULL) AND MPGD.STATUS_BY != #USER_ID# AND cast(#HIERARCHY_ID# as numeric) >= (SELECT DISTINCT DECODE(NVL(SAME_HIERARCHY_ALLOWED,'N'), 'Y', HIERARCHY_ID, HIERARCHY_ID + 1) FROM USER_MASTER UM, ROLE_MASTER RM WHERE RM.ROLE_ID = UM.USER_ROLE AND UM.USER_ID = MPGD.STATUS_BY) AND AUTHORIZE_STATUS IS NULL
UPDATE MDS_PRODUCT_GENERAL_DETAILS SET AUTHORIZE_STATUS = #STATUS#,AUTHORIZE_BY = #USER_ID#,AUTHORIZE_DATE = #AUTHORIZEDT# WHERE PROD_ID = #PROD_ID#
sql-map.dynamic-mapped-statement:
SELECT AD.AC_HD_ID AS "Account Head",AD.AC_HD_CODE AS "Account Head Code", AD.AC_HD_DESC AS "Account HEAD DESCRIPTION" FROM AC_HD AD, AC_HD_PARAM ADP WHERE ( AD.STATUS != 'DELETED' OR AD.STATUS IS NULL ) AND AD.AUTHORIZE_STATUS = 'AUTHORIZED' AND ( ADP.STATUS != 'DELETED' OR ADP.STATUS IS NULL ) AND ADP.AUTHORIZE_STATUS = 'AUTHORIZED' AND AD.AC_HD_ID = ADP.AC_HD_ID
AD.AC_HD_ID = #ACCT_HD#
AD.MJR_AC_HD_ID IN (SELECT MJR_AC_HD_ID FROM MJR_AC_HD WHERE MJR_AC_HD_TYPE= #ACCT_TYPE# AND STATUS != 'DELETED' OR STATUS IS NULL) AND ADP.BALANCETYPE = #BALANCETYPE#
ROWNUM <= 100
UPPER(AD.AC_HD_CODE) LIKE UPPER('%$Account Head Code$%')
UPPER(AD.AC_HD_DESC) LIKE UPPER('%$Account Head Description$%')
UPPER(AD.AC_HD_ID) LIKE UPPER('%$Account Head$%')
